sentence: The nearest airport is Miami International Airport.

sentence: There are a few parks and playgrounds in Ocean Front, Miami Beach, including New World Symphony Park, Miami Beach Playground, and Maurice Gibb Memorial Park.

sentence: Dessert shops like Miami Beach Chocolates, Rosetta Bakery, and KITH MIA in Ocean Front, Miami Beach are great options for satifying your sweet tooth.

sentence: Ocean Front, Miami Beach has quite a few grocery stores including Publix, Triton Supermarket, and The Fresh Market.

sentence: For young families in Ocean Front, Miami Beach, childcare options include MedRite Urgent Care, Super-Y Early Learning Center, Fallon Fitzgerald Stylist, and South Beach Urgent Care. Proximity to urgent care centers such as MedRite Urgent Care, Medigo Urgent Care, and South Beach Urgent Care is also a plus.
title: Child Care

sentence: Residents love to order tacos from Tequiztlan Mexican Restaurant And Tequila Bar, Naked Taco, or Bodega Taqueria y Tequila and burgers from Shake Shack, 11th Street Diner, or Cheeseburger Baby. Shake Shack, The Ocean Grill, or Tequiztlan Mexican Restaurant And Tequila Bar are some great spots for a fun dine-in experience.
title: Nearby Restaurants

sentence: You can grab your morning cup of coffee from Market at EDITION, Starbucks, or Matador Room and sit down for a relaxed weekend brunch at Matador Room, Pao by Paul Qui at Faena, or Brothers Cafe & Market.
title: Nearby Coffee Shops

sentence: There are 4 electric vehicle charging locations in Ocean Front, Miami Beach with 10 level-2 charging points.
title: EV Charging Nearby

sentence: Broadband internet connection options in Ocean Front, Miami Beach include Asymmetrical xDSL, DOCSIS, terrestrial fixed wireless, VDSL, wireline, ADSL, satellite, and fiber from 14 different providers.  Aside from optic fiber which provides Gbps speeds, you can get up to 1000 mbps download speeds via DOCSIS powered by Atlantic Broadband Finance, LLC.
title: Fixed Broadband

sentence: North Beach Elementary School (#25 in metro), North Dade Center for Modern Languages Elementary School (#16 in metro), Somerset Academy Charter Elementary School - South Miami (#49 in metro) are among 8 A+/A rated public elementary schools in the district.

sentence: Archimedean Middle Conservatory (AMC) (#12 in metro), Jose Marti MAST 6-12 Academy (#5 in metro), Mast Academy (#2 in metro) are among 10 A+/A rated public middle schools in the district.

sentence: Design & Architecture Senior High School (#16 in metro), Terra Environmental Research Institute (#18 in metro), Doral Academy Charter High School (#25 in metro) are among 19 A+/A rated public high schools in the district.

sentence: The nearby elementary school, middle school and high school quality ratings from Niche are very similar. If you have children and desire a consistent school experience as they grow up, this neighborhood may be a good place to plant long-term roots.
title: Consistent School Rating

sentence: Ocean Front, Miami Beach has a walk score of 56 and a transit score of 57.
title: Mobility
